question: What is the name of Raoul's family and their land holdings?
explaination: Naxen is the home fief of one of Raoul's friends

question: Who was called "Raoul's shy blonde shadow" in "Alanna: the First Adventure"?
explaination: Francis was a very minor character within "Alanna: the First Adventure" (he was part of the group of friends that Alanna belonged to). Francis seemed to be closest to Raoul out of the group though. He died of the Sweating Sickness when it struck the Palace.

question: In "In The Hand of the Goddess" who is Raoul's Squire?
explaination: There is a bit of confusion in the world of Tammy-verse as to who Raoul and Gary's squire are "In the Hand of Goddess" as Douglass of Veldine and Sacherall of Wellam seem to switch knight-masters.

question: Which of these descriptions fit Raoul?
correct_answer: Currly black hair - solidly built - tall - black eyes
wrong_answer_1: Straight black hair - thin - average hieght - dark brown eyes
wrong_answer_2: Straight brown hair - solidly built - tall - black eyes
wrong_answer_3: Curly brown hair - thin - average height - dark brown eyes
explaination: Raoul is described as having tightly curling black hair - black eyes - and being "decidedly large".

question: Who sent Raoul to The Roof Of The World to fetch Alanna back from her adventure in "Lioness Rampant"?
explaination: It was Jonathan who was "king-in-waiting" after his father's death. Raoul was the Jon sent and it was then he first met Liam Thayet and Buri.

question: Which Bazhir trib 'adopted' Raoul into their tribe?
explaination: In "Lioness Rampant" Raoul mentions that he was adopted by the Bazhir -- but says that it was the Sandrunners -- not Alanna and Coram's trib -- the Bloody Hawk.

question: Who did Raoul formally arrest in "Wolf Speaker"?
explaination: It was Yolane. She committed high treason to the crown. (With Carthak's help) She tried to put herself on the throne.

question: By the Start of the "Protector of the Small" Quartet -- What changes has Raoul made to the Own?
wrong_answer_1: Added the second and third Comapanies
wrong_answer_3: Made it into an effective combat unit
explaination: Raoul did all of this. When he first came to the post of Knight Commander -- the Own was a cosy assignment for young men who liked to meet pretty young ladies with doweries. He first made them into a combat unit. Then he let Bazhir into the Own. Then he expanded into the second and third companies.

question: Raoul was elevated to the peerage and given the lands of Malorie's Peek after defeating a giant that was how many feet tall?
explaination: In "First Test" -- Neal tells kel that "It was only a 20 foot giant" that Raoul had killed.

question: By "First Test" -- what is Raoul's full title? (watch the spelling!)
correct_answer: Raoul of Golden Lake and Mallory's Peak
wrong_answer_3: Roaul of Goldenlake and Malorie's Peak
explaination: Goldenlake is Raoul's family and Malorie's Peak is the lands that Raoul received when he was elevated to the Peerage. Pirate's Swoop is the lands that George Copper got when he became a Baron.

question: Who accused Raoul of taking Kel as his squire "Only because the Lioness asked you to" in "Squire"?
explaination: Captain Flyndan of the Third Company was the one who voiced this accusation.

question: Raoul won't touch which kind of drink?
explaination: As Raoul had a drinking problem in his younger years -- he avoids alcohol and spirits now.question

question: Where did Kel suggest Raoul should hid at the Midwinter party in "Squire"?
explaination: Behind the wall hangings -- Kel told buri they would see the lump behind the hangings if he was actually within the room.

question: What is the Knight Commander of the King's Own well known for?
wrong_answer_2: Beating Wyldon of Cavall at jousting
explaination: The answer is avoiding social functions.Raoul hates pretending to be nice to people he doesn't like. And Raoul has never beaten Wyldon at jousting. The fact that Raoul never drank alcohol is known by very few people.

question: What did Third Company name the fort that they built in "Squire" -- supposedly in honor of Raoul?
explaination: It was the Giantkiller -- but knowing that Raoul would complain and protest at the name -- Third company waited until he and Kel had gone back south for her ordeal before they named it.

question: What did Raoul say to Wyldon when he heard that Kel had gone after the Haven refugees in "Lady Knight"?
wrong_answer_1: If she dies -- Mithros forgive you. I nevel will.
wrong_answer_2: I'd've wrapped her in chains and brought her back over her horse.
explaination: All of these

question: Which squad does Raoul ask to follow Kel and help her after he finds out Kel has gone after the refugees?
explaination: Raoul asked Dom and his squad to go -- allowing them the opportunity to back out if they wanted to.

question: When and where did Raoul and Buri get married?
explaination: In the Epilogue of "Lady Knight" (dated the Tenth of September -- 460 HE) Kel and Neal are leaving Haven to go to Steadfast for the wedding celebrations. Buri had gotten tired of waiting for Raoul to come back south at the end of the fighting -- so after the Royal wedding of Roald and Shinkokami -- Buri (and Yuki) headed up to Steadfast.

question: Who does Raoul take on as his squire around the time of "Trickster's Queen"?
explaination: In "Trickster's Queen" -- Tkaa visits the Court of the Copper Isles -- there he gives Aly all the news from home. That news includes the fact that her older brother -- Thom is continueing with his mage studies -- and her twin brother -- Alan is squired to Raoul.

question: What event is particular did Raoul let his new squire go to the Copper Isles for?
wrong_answer_1: The coronation of the new Queen
wrong_answer_2: The coronation of the new King
wrong_answer_3: He was sent to spy on people
explaination: Alan went to the Copper Isles to attend his twin sister's (Aly) wedding.

question: Alanna: The First Adventure - What did Alanna see in Maude's fire?
explaination: She saw the black city of the Ysandir.She was afraid of that she saw.

question: In The Hand Of The Goddess - Why did George kiss Alanna?
explaination: Alanna was holding all of Jon's birthday presents.

question: The Women Who Rides Like A Man - What weapon did Alanna use while fighting Hakim Fahrah?
explaination: They were allowed daggers -- but really they were wrestling.

question: Lioness Rampant - Where did Alanna have to go to get the Dominion Jewel?
wrong_answer_2: Nowhere -- she just did a spell
wrong_answer_3: The Realm of the Black God
explaination: She had to travel through Sarain to get there. At the roof of the world -- she went through Chitral Pass.

question: Wild Magic - What was the first Immortal that Daine came across?
explaination: A Stormwing attacked her and Onua on the way to the palace.

question: Wolf Speaker - What did Numair turn his opponent into?
explaination: Somewhere -- because of the word he used -- a tree become a human.

question: The Emporer Mage - What was Numair's real name?
explaination: Numair felt that when he moved to Tortall -- he was a new person. His name was Arram Draper.

question: Sandry's Book - Which epidemic did Sandry's parents die in?
explaination: There was a small pox epidemic in Hatar. Her parents died there. Her nurse was beaten to death by a mob.

question: Tris's Book - What is Tris's bird called?
explaination: He is called that because he shrieks so much.

question: Daja's Book - Which Caravan Idaram are the Traders from?
explaination: It was Tenth Caravan Idaram. Daja was invited to become part of this trader group at the end of the book.

question: Briar's Book - What day did Brair pick as his Birthday?
correct_answer: The day Rosethorn came into his life
wrong_answer_3: The day he came to Winding Circle
explaination: It was the dat after the Four's birthday.

question: First Test - Who are the boys who started at the same time as Kel?
explaination: They all become her friends -- apart from Quinden.

question: Page - Who was meant to be in charge when they came upon the Bandits?
explaination: Kel had to take over because Faleron was too afraid.

question: Lady Knight - What was Owen's horse called?
explaination: Happy died at the end of the book.

question: Magic Steps - Where was Pasco dancing when he first met Sandry?
explaination: He was doing a dance to bring all the fish to him.

question: Street Magic - How many Stone Mages are there (not including Evvy) where Evvy lives?
explaination: StoneSlicer made the others leave. He was scared of Evvy's power.

question: Who is the main character in the *first* quarter by Tamora Pierce?
explaination: Keladry of Mindelan was the heroine in the quartet "Protector of the Small". The other two choices are made up.
